name: Myken's Ball of Hate
flavorText: Myken, famed sorcerer of the island nation of Uie, was known for his vitriolic demeanor. One day, at the height of a fevered tirade, the magical embodiment of his wrath burst from his body, granting the spellcaster a serenity that he'd missed for years. Many have since sought the orb, hoping to master its terrible destructive force.
